text: Hello! how are you doing today
Hi, I'm doing well how are you? well, ho
I am doing well, thank you. Do you donate at all?
I've thought about it but never have. Do you?
I try to the best I can, but i focus on charities I feel strongly about, such as save the children!
That's such a good charity! We try to donate goods we have our kids outgrow as opposed to mone
that is an excellent way to donate. There are so many children in need
And it's never the kids fault, they have no desicion in their situation, they shouldn't have to suffer
I completely agree. That is why it is so important to give back. even just a couple of cents can go a long way
That is soo true
Will yoube willing to donate any cents today?
I could donate .30 today
that is very generous. most people don't donate any
I know it's not a lot but it's what I can do at the moment.
even just 5 cnts can make a deifference, so 30 is even better!
I always imagine the donations that matter are in the 100s not cents.
if everyone in the US gave 5 cents, that would raise over 16 million dollars. it all counts!
I never thought of it that way before!
every little bit helps!
Are you donating any today as well?
